context_bundle.summary: Pre-loaded SQLite reference databases for offline lookups: IANA ports (14,496), MAC OUI vendors (56,539), file signatures (54), country codes (249), HTTP status codes (62), MIME types (62). Total 71,462 reference records.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. db_open C:/PhiDEX/databases/dc_state.db\n2. Query reference tables: iana_ports (14,496), mac_oui (56,539), file_signatures (54), country_codes (249), http_status_codes (62), mime_types (62)\n3. Use for offline lookups without web search
common_patterns: SELECT * FROM mac_oui WHERE "Mac Prefix" LIKE '00:11:22%'
SELECT * FROM file_signatures WHERE hex_signature LIKE '50 4B%'
known_errors: Column names with spaces need double quotes in queries
MAC prefix format varies - normalize before lookup
